bibl.title: On the New Fragments of Greek Poetry from Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: A few random supplements and remarks. - P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708: The 'Newest' Archilochus; - 4711: Parthenius' Metamorphoses; - 4712: Argonautica (Cleon of Kourion?); - 4713: Anonymous Hexameters.
bibl.seg: MAGNELLI Enrico, On the New Fragments of Greek Poetry from Oxyrhynchus.
